QuestData.Title: Friends With Benefits
QuestData.Description: The Lunastre Attendant, silent as ever, offers you a wax-sealed scroll.$b$bIt reads:$b"Dearest $n,$b$bI asked my attendant to catch you, should things go in my favor.$b$bThe role of Advisor will keep me away from the estate for some time and I settled on a gift for Thalyssra.$b$bI have sent a detachment of attendants to Shal'Aran with some comfort items. Treat them well- they need someone to wait on and I could think of none better!$b$bGive the others my thanks, and my love,$bAdvisor Ly'leth Lunastre"
QuestData.RewardText: She certainly is a worthy companion.
